jobTitle: Graduate Engineer Trainee (GET) / Diploma Engineer Trainee (DET)
jobDescription: Gain hands-on experience in various engineering disciplines within the steel & heavy equipment industry.  Work on real-time projects in production, quality control, maintenance, and project management under the guidance of senior engineers. Participate in a comprehensive training program.
requiredSkills: Good organizational and time management skills
Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills
preferredQualifications: Bachelor's degree/Diploma in Mechanical Engineering, Metallurgical Engineering, Electrical Engineering
salaryRange:
GET Rs. 5.5 LPA (Training) / Rs.7.4 LPA (Confirmation)
DET Rs. 4.0 LPA (Training) / Rs.5.0 LPA (Confirmation)
